description: This schema represents a set of sensor data collected by a mobile device used by a user while performing a supervised physical test.

data.description: Collection of values product of the sensor device used while performing the physical test. Respective collection of values is tabular separated to avoid ambiguity.

format.description: Formar in which sensed data is been delivered. For instance JSON, CVS, TVS.

brand.description: Device brand defined from respective manufacture.

software.description: Software version defined from installed program that is gathering sensor data from respective device.

library.description: Sofware version or description to further identify the library used by the main software to collect sensor data.
